name: A Story From the Sky [demo]
description:
support us on JustGiving - https://www.justgiving.com/A-Story-From-the-Sky

You play as Astori, a space engineer who has crash landed with his crew.
You must warp to different areas and collect energy crystals in order to repair your ship and make it home.

Controls (Keyboard/Gamepad)

ENTER/Start Button - Start game
Arrow Keys / Left Joystick- Movement
Up Key / A Button - Jump / Double jump
(hold) SPACE / Right trigger - activate jetpack

plays best in full-screen with a gamepad!
early alpha demo, game is currently in development
follow twitter for updates @storyfromthesky
